thread.title: My go to Hotel in NYC
thread.title_full: My go to Hotel in NYC - Review of Andaz Wall Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: rickhalpern2017
title: My go to Hotel in NYC
text: I've been staying at the Andaz for many years. Whenever business takes my to NYC, this is my hotel of choice, not least because the Sat/Sun rates drop. The staff are great; the rooms are modern and comfortable; and all the subway lines converge conveniently in lower Manhattan.
